scripts.dev: node --watch --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from 'node:module'; import { pathToFileURL } from 'node:url'; register('./node/loader.ts', pathToFileURL('./'))" src/index.ts --debug
scripts.start: node --import "data:text/javascript,import { register } from 'node:module'; import { pathToFileURL } from 'node:url'; register('./node/loader.ts', pathToFileURL('./'))" src/index.ts
scripts.pm2:start: pm2 start src/index.ts --name fuyu-tdbot --interpreter node --node-args="--import \"data:text/javascript,import { register } from 'node:module'; import { pathToFileURL } from 'node:url'; register('./node/loader.ts', pathToFileURL('./'))\""
